frame.name: Substance
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame concerns internally undifferentiated <fen>Substance</fen>s.
<ex>As their gut bacteria ferment cellulose , they generate <fex name="con">methane</fex> <t>gas</t> , which escapes from the rear ends of the insects.</ex>
<ex> The pipes are leaking <fex name="des">noxious</fex> <t>gas</t>.</ex>
<ex>Some CH-47 "Bombers" were equipped to roll-out <fex name="use">riot control</fex> <t>gas</t> or napalm onto Viet Cong bunker complexes from the rear cargo ramp.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Constituents
FE.definition:
<def-root>The frame element expresses substances/ingredients that make up the Substance.
<ex><fex name="con">Argon</fex> <t>gas</t> is added into the station's air mixture.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Substance
FE.definition:
<def-root>The undifferentiated entity which is presented as having a permanent existence.
<ex><fex name="sub"><t>Liquid</t></fex> flowed over the rocks but it was not water.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Type
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE indicates what subtype of the general category the <fen>Substance</fen> belongs to.
<ex><fex name="typ">Greenhouse</fex> <t>gases</t> trap heat and prevent its escape from the atmosphere.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Origin
FE.definition:
<def-root>The location that the <fen>Substance</fen> comes from, including both extraction sites and emission/production sources.
<ex>It retrieves most of the expensively generated heat from <fex name="sou">flue</fex> <t>gases</t> and puts this heat back into the system.</ex> <ex> The transport of <fex name="sou">Iraqi</fex> <t>petroleum</t> and petroleum products through the Kirkuk- Yumurtalik pipeline in Turkey is authorized by paragraph 1 a.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition:
<def-root>A characterization of the <fen>Substance</fen>.
<ex>The new Chrysler minivans will run on <fex name="Descriptor">compressed</fex> natural <t>gas</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Inherent_purpose
FE.definition:
<def-root>The purpose for which the <fen>Substance</fen> is intended.
<ex>Supply and placing of <fex name="Inherent_purpose">filler</fex> <t>sand</t> shall be incidental to installation of the paving stones.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: uranium.n
lexUnit.definition: uit de derde groep van het periodiek systeem, dat radioactief is, een zeer hard, zwaar, zilverwit metaal, dat o.a. bij de winning van atoomenergie gebruikt wordt

lexUnit.name: plutonium.n
lexUnit.definition: dat radioactief is, in kerncentrales gemaakt wordt en in kernwapens gebruikt kan worden

lexUnit.name: zuurstof.n
lexUnit.definition: uit de scheikunde (O), een kleur-, reuk- en smaakloos gas dat zelf niet brandt, maar voor de verbranding noodzakelijk is en voor de ademhaling van mensen en dieren onontbeerlijk is
